text: Sonia Evans (born 13 February 1971), known mononymously as Sonia, is an English singer from Liverpool. She represented the United Kingdom in the 1993 Eurovision Song Contest. She finished in second place in the contest. Sonia sang the song "Better the Devil You Know" from her album of the same name. Sonia released her first album in 1990. She has had many songs on the charts in the late 1980s and early 1990s. She has released four albums in total. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:English singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Sonia (singer)
